data.Name: Ganja White Night 11/12
data.Subtitle: with Boogie T, SubDocta, Stratus B2B Walter Wilde, Computa B2B Matt Doe
data.Description:
GANJA WHITE NIGHT at Red Rocks Amphitheatre on April 17, 2020 and Friday April 16th, 2021 has been rescheduled to Friday November 12th, 2021.

There is nothing you need to do as your tickets will be valid for the new date.


AEG Presents is thrilled to announce GANJA WHITE NIGHT live at Red Rocks Amphitheatre on Friday November 12th, 2021.

data.Name: Ganja White Night
data.Bio: Ganja White Night is a dubstep live act coming from Mons, Belgium. Their two first tracks Strawberry Cough and Purple Star were the starting point for them to develop a style made of sharp beats, explosive basses and tricky space melodies. They toured live across Europe, and are starting their first USA tour in February 2013. Lately they created their own digital label named SubCarbon to get to the next level and to get heard by the whole wide world. Read more on Last.fm

data.Name: SubDocta
data.Bio: Preston Charles aka SubDocta is a music producer/sound engineer hailing from Reno, Nevada. Over the past year, SubDocta has been making a crater-like impact on the bass scene with his famed track, “2009 Was Tight” as well as his most recent release “Skeleton Key“. We spoke with SubDocta about everything from his favorite musical memories to his current tour with Opiuo and beyond. Scroll below for the full interview! Read more on Last.fm
